page.title: 02Quantock Views
page.content: Becase of its closeness to {Taunton and {Bridgwater}when the weather is fine and clear the roads and carparks are very popular with people out to enjoy the magnificent views which stretch away on all sides of the ridge. From the windswept heather look {westward }to the {Brendon Hills }and { {Exmoor}with {Dunkery Beacon}On a very clear day beyond this are glimpses of{ {Dartmoor.}Turn{eastward }and the { {River Parrett }gleams silvery past flat farmland and through{Bridgwater. The Mendips with its transmitting mast showing white in the sun sweep round beyound {Bridgwater Bay}At night { Hinkley Point Power Station}lit up looks like a fairytale castle. Look over the {Severn} past the islands of Flat Holm and {Steep Holm} and see Wales and the {Brecon Beacons.} Fantastic views indeed.
